name: 1001 Jigsaw. Castles And Palaces 5
description:
Magnificent architecture and valiant warriors! Put the puzzles together and enjoy the atmosphere of the royal domain.

In the game you can adjust the level of difficulty, receive various hints when assembling the puzzle, and save partially assembled puzzles at any time. This game is suitable for both beginners and experienced players to enjoy the game and the beautiful views.

- 500 high quality pictures
- Sophisticated game mode: handy hints, sorting and a magnifier
- Individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play forever
- Feature to turn off the rotation of puzzle pieces
- Possibility to save and continue a puzzle at any moment
- Colorful trophies
